programme.title: Women's Short Program Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 15/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Kamila Valieva (ROC) qualified in first place with a score of 82.16.The results are provisional.

programme.title: Women's Free Skating Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Anna Shcherbakova (ROC) won the gold medal with 255.95 points. Her teammate Alexandra Trusova (ROC) scored a total of 251.73 and took the silver while Kaori Sakamoto (JPN) came third with 233.13. The results are provisional.

programme.title: Men's Free Skating Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 10/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium, Nathan Chen (USA) won Gold with a final score of 332.60, Yuma Kagiyama (JPN) claimed Silver and Shoma Uno (JPN) completed the podium.

programme.title: My Great Winter Olympic Moments with Arianna Fontana
programme.desc: Arianna Fontana is the greatest female short track speed skater in Olympic history. Her numbers at the Games speak for themselves; one gold, two silver, and five bronze. In this edition of My Great Winter Olympic Moments she talks about her Tokyo 2020 plans, burnout on ice and life beyond the speed skating ring, with special appearances by her husband and coach Anthony Lobello Jr., Italian Alps, church bells and her beloved Great Dane - Zeus.

programme.title: Women's Short Program Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 15/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Kamila Valieva (ROC) qualified in first place with a score of 82.16.The results are provisional.

programme.title: Pairs Free Skating Final - Figure Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 19/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. Wenjing Sui and Cong Han (CHN) claimed the Gold, Evgenia Tarasova and Vladimir Morozov (ROC) Silver and Anastasia Mishina and Aleksandr Galliamov (ROC) completed the podium.
